lead_paragraph: An article on Thursday about the Army Marksmanship Unit, a squad dedicated to training and employing Olympic-level shooters, referred incorrectly to shooters from the Army on this year’s United States team for the Beijing Games. At least one woman will participate; the Army’s team will not be men only. (Libby Callahan, a member of the Army Reserve but not of the Army Marksmanship Unit, is a member.).
